Major_Arcs.title: The Mystery of Ghost Town and Airport Plans
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the woman in Ghost Town and the initial conflict arising from the modern plan to build an airport, threatening the town's historical essence.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Frustrated Explanations
sub_scenes.description: A woman finds herself in Ghost Town and desperately tries to explain her unbelievable situation to various men, highlighting her urgency and frustration.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Explanations in Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Airport Development Threat and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: The woman overhears plans to build an airport in Ghost Town and confronts the men involved, expressing her horror and attachment to the town's historical value, leading to a clash between preservation and progress.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Airport Plans and Confrontation in Ghost Town

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Dynamics and Desert Revelation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the evolving relationship between the woman and Cal, shifting from romantic misunderstandings and past hurts to a significant offer in the blasted desert.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Understanding and Past Turmoil
sub_scenes.description: The woman and Cal discuss their relationship, moving from romantic misunderstandings to internal reflections on past emotional pain and setting the stage for a new development.

sub_scenes.title: The Real Offer and Work Site Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Cal redirects the conversation to a 'real offer' in the 'blasted desert', leading the woman to a work site where she encounters and interacts with construction workers, creating a tense atmosphere.

narrative_arcs.title: The Real Offer in the Blasted Desert
Arrival at the Work Site and Confrontation with Workers

Major_Arcs.title: Business Deals and Family Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to business dealings related to horses and the airport, intertwined with family conflicts and emotional turmoil, particularly involving Nan and her father.

sub_scenes.title: Horse Transportation and Airport Business
sub_scenes.description: Discussions revolve around horse transportation plans for the airport and cattle business, introducing Nan and her father and their differing viewpoints.

narrative_arcs.title: Helping Construction Workers and Crazy Notions

sub_scenes.title: Father-Daughter Conflict and Maid's Comfort
sub_scenes.description: The conflict between Nan and her father escalates, leading to emotional distress and a maid's attempt to offer comfort, highlighting the generational and emotional gaps.

narrative_arcs.title: Solace in Tears and Maid's Comfort

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Advice and Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc delves into relationship advice given to Nan by her mother and maid, leading to a direct confrontation between Nan and Cal regarding their feelings.

sub_scenes.title: Parental and Maid's Relationship Advice
sub_scenes.description: Nan receives advice from her mother and the maid about love, patience, and understanding Cal's expressions of affection, offering different perspectives on her relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother's Advice on Love and Patience
Maid's Practical Advice and Cal's Love

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation, Chase and Business Commitment
sub_scenes.description: Nan confronts Cal demanding clarity about their relationship, leading to a chase and a shift to business responsibilities and commitment to a deal, blending personal and professional stakes.

narrative_arcs.title: Desperate Chase and Plea for Attention
Yore Dad's Deal and No Backing Down

Major_Arcs.title: Emotional Resolution and Confessions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the emotional climax of Nan and Cal's relationship, moving from emotional confessions and practical concerns to a resolution and flashback revealing past loneliness.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Confession and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Nan expresses her feelings while Cal focuses on practicalities, leading to a scene of departure and apparent acceptance, but underlying emotional tension remains.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Confession of Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: A flashback reveals Nan's loneliness during Cal's absence, leading to Cal's confession of pursuit and admission of his long-held feelings, resolving their emotional tension.

Major_Arcs.title: The Snowstorm Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a severe snowstorm crisis, threatening livestock and community, leading to decisive action and hope through an airlift.

sub_scenes.title: Affection, Foreboding, and Grim Weather Report
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal's affection is juxtaposed with a narrator's foreboding tone, followed by a grim weather report detailing severe snowfall and its impact, setting up a crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Despair and Hope from the Airlift
sub_scenes.description: Initial despair and resignation to the snowstorm are suddenly replaced by hope with the arrival of an airlift, bringing relief and a sense of community.

narrative_arcs.title: Sound of Hope: Arrival of the Plane

Major_Arcs.title: The Introduction of Chane Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and explores initial public reactions and varying perspectives on his forceful character and actions.

sub_scenes.title: Cowtown Showdown and Divergent Reactions
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson's forceful actions in a Western town provoke diverse public reactions, from intrigue to disapproval, setting the stage for varied interpretations of his character.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Critical Opinion of Chane Benson
Sally and Older Man's More Mature Perspective on Chane Benson

Major_Arcs.title: Escalating Conflict and Benson Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays escalating conflict around Jeff, his hero worship of Clyde, and the rising threat posed by Benson, moving from verbal arguments to physical violence and confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Hero Worship and Gun Handling Concerns
sub_scenes.description: Sally reflects on Jeff's hero worship of his brother and questions his handling of guns, setting a tone of concern and foreshadowing potential danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Past Hero Worship and Questioning Gun Handling
Reassurance and Commitment to Change Jeff

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Mr. Benson and Rising Threat
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Benson is introduced, setting a suspenseful tone with storytelling and foreshadowing a tense and dangerous atmosphere, while Sally and Clyde discuss Jeff's issues.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Mr. Benson and Storytelling
Confrontation and Denial about the Article
Benson's Declaration to Stay and Fight Killers

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation and Escalating Violence
sub_scenes.description: Threats escalate, leading to a dinner invitation intended for conciliation, but underlying tensions erupt into violence and a tense showdown.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Defiant Articles and Public Reaction
End of Dinner and Moonlight Charm

sub_scenes.title: Standoff Resolution and Newspaper Relief
sub_scenes.description: The tense standoff with Benson is resolved, leading to reflection, remorse, and a return to newspaper work, signifying a shift from conflict to relief and routine.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution of the Standoff and Benson's Departure
Reflecting on Tension and Expressing Remorse
Headline Change, Relief, and Newspaper Work

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Steve Daley as a bodyguard, setting up a new storyline with range war conflicts and Steve's role in protecting Betsy.

sub_scenes.title: Bodyguard Hiring and Range War Foreshadowing
sub_scenes.description: Initial confrontation sets the tone, followed by the introduction of Steve Daley as Betsy's bodyguard, and foreshadowing of trouble related to the range war.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley as Bodyguard

sub_scenes.title: Range War Discussion and Steve's Assistance
sub_scenes.description: Introductions are followed by discussions about the range war and its troubles, with Steve offering assistance and integrating into Betsy's situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion of Range War and Underlying Troubles

sub_scenes.title: Store Departure and Physical Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Departure from the store leads to observation of Daley, confrontation with Fred Bridges, and a physical altercation, highlighting Steve's skills and the escalating danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Departure from the Store and Daley's Observation
Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Hired Hand
Observations on Steve's Skills and Impending Danger

sub_scenes.title: Resolving Employment and Expressing Gratitude
sub_scenes.description: Betsy makes a decision about Steve's employment, leading to Maverick's assumptions and Hank's clarification, culminating in mutual expressions of gratitude.

narrative_arcs.title: Maverick's Observation and Question to Betsy
Hank Defends Steve and Maverick's Suggestion

Major_Arcs.title: Love and Choice for Betsy and Steve
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on Betsy and Steve's burgeoning romance, presenting a conflict between love and principles, and culminating in Steve's ultimate choice for love.

sub_scenes.title: Job Conditions and Confession of Love
sub_scenes.description: Betsy sets conditions for Steve's job, leading to a dilemma and an unexpected confession of love from Betsy, changing the dynamic of their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Steve's Dilemma and Betsy's Confession of Love
Steve's Ultimate Proof of Love and Betsy's Acceptance

Major_Arcs.title: Range War Escalation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalating range war, moving from angry outbursts and accusations to armed standoffs and a revelation of past violence.

sub_scenes.title: Angry Outbursts and Accusations
sub_scenes.description: Old Man Bridges expresses anger, accusing trespassing, leading to confrontations and escalating tensions related to the range war.

narrative_arcs.title: Bridges Confronts Hank and Accuses Trespassing
Betsy and Steve Prepare for Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Armed Standoff and Ambush Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Armed standoff ensues, with Betsy justifying violence and recounting a past ambush and loss of horses, revealing the deep-seated conflict and reasons for her stance.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy Justifies Gun Violence as Necessary
Betsy Recounts the Ambush and Loss of Horses
Aftermath of the Ambush and Hank's Escape

Major_Arcs.title: Decision for Violence and Devil's Pass Gunfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Betsy's decision to resort to violence, her confrontation with Steve, and the ensuing gunfight at Devil's Pass.

sub_scenes.title: Resolve for Guns and Ultimatum Over Violence
sub_scenes.description: Betsy resolves to use guns, leading to an argument and ultimatum from Steve, and her internal decision-making process.

sub_scenes.title: Ride to Devil's Pass and Gunfight Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Betsy rides to Devil's Pass, hearing gunfire upon arrival, leading to a gunfight, injury, and immediate aftermath, testing their resolve and relationships.

narrative_arcs.title: Ride to Devil's Pass and Gunfire Encounter
Arrival at Devil's Pass and Warning

Major_Arcs.title: New Conflict: Bear Fenin's Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new conflict with Bear Fenin, focusing on range disputes and cattle concerns, shifting the narrative to a different set of characters and challenges.

sub_scenes.title: Disagreement and Bear Fenin's Threat
sub_scenes.description: A personal disagreement sets the stage for a new threat involving Bear Fenin and concerns over range and cattle, introducing a fresh conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern over Curley and Bear Fenin's Threat

sub_scenes.title: Fence Confrontation and Expulsion
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation over a newly erected fence escalates tensions, leading to cattle concerns and the rancher's decisive expulsion of Fred Gordon and his men.

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie, Dave and Fred - Relationship Drama
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the complex relationships between Carrie, Dave, and Fred, exploring past apologies, lingering resentment, and unexpected romantic developments.

sub_scenes.title: Past Apologies and Unexpected Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Reflections on past apologies and resentment set the stage for Carrie's reluctance to discuss Fred, leading to an unexpected encounter with him.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Past Apologies and Lingering Resentment
Carrie's Reluctance to Discuss Fred and Preference for Dave

sub_scenes.title: Sarcasm, Truce and Marriage Proposal
sub_scenes.description: Initial confrontation turns sarcastic, leading to a tentative truce and an unexpected marriage proposal, marking a dramatic shift in their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Confrontation and Demand to Leave Dave Alone
Reflection on Love and a Marriage Proposal

sub_scenes.title: Deception Revealed and Business Meeting
sub_scenes.description: Realization of deception regarding Fred's motives leads to confrontation, justification attempts, and a subsequent business meeting, revealing underlying tensions and strategic maneuvering.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Deception and Contract Motive
Night of Reflection and Business Meeting

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Surrender in Carlton's Office
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation in Carlton's office reveals manipulations and leads to Carrie's assertive stance, followed by an unexpected surrender, shifting the power dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Farewell and Confession of Love (Incorrect)
sub_scenes.description: Angry farewell to Fred is followed by a chance encounter with Dave, leading to a confession of love to Dave, and a flashback revealing past advice and prideful refusal related to Fred.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Resolution for Carrie and Fred
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the romantic resolution between Carrie and Fred, moving from illness and urgent messages to revelations, reunion, and a romantic climax.

sub_scenes.title: Illness and Beef Contract Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Carrie's illness and a visit from her father, Dave, and Mr. Carlton lead to the revelation about the beef contract and Fred's honorable actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Carrie's Shame, Regret, and Joyful Ride

Major_Arcs.title: The Dirk and Chris Story Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc starts the story of Dirk and Chris, marked by Dirk's injury, medical diagnosis, and initial concern from Chris and her family.

sub_scenes.title: Injured Dirk and Medical Diagnosis
sub_scenes.description: Injured Dirk seeks Chris's help, leading to a flashback of their meeting and a doctor's diagnosis of Dirk's bullet wound, setting up the initial conflict and concern.

narrative_arcs.title: Past Encounter - Dirk and Chris Meet

Major_Arcs.title: The Pursuit and Capture of Dirk
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the pursuit and capture of Dirk by the Marshal, leading to a tense standoff and eventual arrest, driven by duty and justice.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Ranch Search
sub_scenes.description: Concern for Dirk leads to investigation plans, the arrival of the Sheriff/Marshal, and a ranch search, escalating tension and setting up a direct confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern for Dirk and Investigation Plan
Sheriff Arrives and Identifies Chris & Dirk's Trail

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Conditional Stay
sub_scenes.description: Interrogation of Chris by the Marshal reveals Dirk's crime, followed by Chris's plea for delay and the Marshal's conditional stay, creating a temporary truce.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Delay and Conditional Stay

sub_scenes.title: Confession, Arrest and Uncertain Future
sub_scenes.description: Emotional confession from Chris is followed by Dirk's arrest and justification by the Marshal, leading to discussions about Dirk's uncertain future and escape plans.

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk's Escape and Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Dirk's escape attempt, the pursuit by the Marshal, and the violent confrontation leading to a shooting and desperate flight towards Mexico.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit, Evasion and Shooting
sub_scenes.description: Discovery of pursuit leads to flashbacks of evasion attempts, culminating in a violent confrontation and shooting during their escape.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Return and Uncertain Paths
sub_scenes.description: Fleeing the scene leads to escape towards Mexico, but Chris decides to return to Rance, confessing her love and diverging from Dirk's path, while Rance is revealed to be injured.

narrative_arcs.title: Fleeing the Scene and Bandaging Wounds
Escape to Mexico and Criminal Escape
Return to Rance and Confession of Love
Concern for Rance and Separate Paths
Arrival in Mexico and Uncertain Reunion

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Climax for Chris and Rance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc culminates in the romantic resolution for Chris and Rance, marked by Rance's recovery, emotional confessions, and a marriage proposal.

sub_scenes.title: Recovery, Confession and Proposal
sub_scenes.description: Rance's recovery from unconsciousness leads to reassurance, a private conversation, and Chris's heartfelt confession of love, culminating in a marriage proposal and kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Inquiry About Business and Father's Opinion

Major_Arcs.title: The Wedding and Dirk's Return
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the story with wedding preparations, the ceremony, and Dirk's unexpected return, ultimately leading to a peaceful resolution and a happy ending.

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Preparations and Fears
sub_scenes.description: Reflections on marriage plans and vows are interspersed with Chris's lingering fears about Dirk, setting a tone of anticipation mixed with underlying tension before the wedding.

narrative_arcs.title: Vows and Fears Before the Wedding

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Interruption and Peaceful Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Dirk's unexpected arrival interrupts the wedding, leading to a tense confrontation, but ultimately resolved peacefully with explanations and acknowledgments, concluding the story on a harmonious note.

narrative_arcs.title: Backstory of the Man and Rance's Support
